text:
(1) Hall of Fame Terrace, north side, between Loring Place North and Sedgewick Avenue. The house was the B. Andrews home (1879 map) and later (1893 map) the New York Skin and Cancer Hospital. The views were taken the same day.

January 30, 1938

P.L.Sperr

(2) The same, another view.

January 30, 1938

P.L.Sperr
title: Bronx: Hall Of Fame Terrace - Loring Place North
